biography.value: To snare its prey, a giant spider spins elaborate webs or shoots sticky strands of webbing from its abdomen. Giant spiders are most commonly found underground, making their lairs on ceilings or in dark, web-filled crevices. Such lairs are often festooned with web cocoons holding past victims.

description.value:
Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: [[/damage 1d8 + @mod type=piercing average=true]] damage, and the target must make a [[/save con 11 format=long]], taking [[/damage 2d8 type=poison average=true]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If the &Reference[poison]{poison} damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the target is stable but &Reference[poisoned]{poisoned} for 1 hour, even after regaining hit points, and is &Reference[paralyzed]{paralyzed} while &Reference[poisoned]{poisoned} in this way.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 30/60 ft., one creature. Hit: The target is &Reference[restrained]{restrained} by webbing. As an action, the &Reference[restrained]{restrained} target can make a DC 12 &Reference[str]{Strength} check, bursting the webbing on a success. The webbing can also be attacked and destroyed (AC 10; hp 5; vulnerability to &Reference[fire]{fire} damage; immunity to &Reference[bludgeoning]{bludgeoning}, &Reference[poison]{poison}, and &Reference[psychic]{psychic} damage).

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

changes.value: turn=start,name=You can take an action to break free of the web by rolling a Strength Ability Check
turn=end, rollType=check, actionSave=true, saveAbility=str, saveDC=@abilities.str.dc, label=Restrained by Web

description.value:
Spider Climb. The spider can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Web Sense. While in contact with a web, the spider knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

changes.value: turn=start,name=You can take an action to break free of the web by rolling a Strength Ability Check
turn=end, rollType=check, actionSave=true, saveAbility=str, saveDC=@abilities.str.dc, label=Restrained by Web

description.value:
Web Walker. The spider ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

changes.value: turn=start,name=You can take an action to break free of the web by rolling a Strength Ability Check
turn=end, rollType=check, actionSave=true, saveAbility=str, saveDC=@abilities.str.dc, label=Restrained by Web
